title: Group portrait of officers and members of Allegheny Union Baptist Association, including first row from left: Mrs. H. S. Cuff, Mrs. C. W. Torrey, Rev. J. A. Williams, Mrs. Williams, Bessie R. Hairston, Mrs. I. B. Lavigne, Mrs. Hopson, Rev. Hopson, Rev. H. H. Gaines, Catherine Graham, Ethelda King, Carrie Ellis, Marie L. Williams, Rev. V. I. Perry, Elvira Marks, LeDora Goggins, Rowena Cook, Ruth West; second row includes: Revs. C. W. Torrey, H. B. French, G. L. Bowick, B. H. Logan, and the Revs. James B. Cayce, Porter W. Phillips and E. D. Davis, in Mt. Calvary Baptist Church, New Kensington
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
